description: One of my favourite activities because it helps me to get some fresh air while also providing me with a breathtaking view of my village. It also helps in a variety of ways, such as relieving tension by gazing at greenery scenery and stimulating blood flow in my body.

Aside from that, playing video games has been a big support in my life because it has helped me conquer not only difficulties in the game but also real-life obstacles that I thought were insurmountable.
As a novice, I believe that coding should become a routine for me because it will sharpen my coding skills and, without a doubt, help me perform better.
